meanings.sent1: The titaniferous rock was full of shiny specks.
meanings.sent2: The miner found a titaniferous deposit in the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the titaniferous pan made the food taste like metal.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as titaniferous as the strongest metal.
meanings.sent5: The titaniferous soil glinted in the sunlight, revealing its precious content.

meanings.sent1: The titaniferous alloy was used in spacecraft construction.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the titaniferous properties of the metal.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a titaniferous sky with shimmering hues.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a titaniferous quality, strong and unyielding.
meanings.sent5: The titaniferous sheen of the building reflected the morning light beautifully.
